hypothesis_content.title: Coinbase Stock Catalyst Amplification via Correlation Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: COIN stock movement ≥15% in either direction (due to stock-trading rollout news/lawsuits) will amplify BTC price movement in same direction at 2.5x correlation for next 24 hours when BTC-COIN 20-day correlation >0.6.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High correlation periods amplify cross-asset catalysts as COIN acts as equity market proxy for crypto sentiment. Institutional flows through Coinbase create mechanical BTC buying/selling. News catalysts create momentum that spills over via correlated positioning.
entry_conditions: COIN stock has ≥15% move in single session
Move occurs during US market hours (14:30-21:00 UTC)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC moves 2.5x COIN's percentage move (e.g., COIN +15% → BTC +3.75%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC moves opposite direction to COIN for 2 consecutive hours

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC moves <1.5x COIN's move despite high correlation and elevated volume, or moves in opposite direction.
